subtopics.title: Expressing Ability
subtopics.description: Use 'can' to say what someone is able to do.

examples.sample: She can't drive a car yet.

subtopics.title: Asking for Permission
subtopics.description: Use 'can' in questions to request permission.

exercises.question: ___ you help me with this exercise?

exercises.instruction: Respond with lack of ability using 'can't'.
exercises.sentence: I play the piano. (but I'm not able)
